context:
| Year-ended 31 March 2019 | Year-ended 31 March 2018
--- | --- | ---
 | $M | $M
Directors’ emoluments | 2.3 | 3.3
Gains on exercise of share options | 3.6 | 3.5
Gains on vesting of LTIP awards | 14.5 | 4.2
Total Directors’ remuneration | 20.4 | 11.0

paragraph 1: 12 Directors’ Remuneration
paragraph 2: Directors’ emoluments represent all earnings and aggregate contributions to pension schemes made during the year as a Director of Sophos Group plc and its subsidiaries. Further details can be found in the Group’s Remuneration Report on pages 91 to 101.

qa.question: What do the directors' emoluments represent?
qa.answer: ['all earnings and aggregate contributions to pension schemes made during the year as a Director of Sophos Group plc and its subsidiaries']
